articles.content: Maruti Suzuki India Limited was trading over a percent higher at Rs 10,700 on October 30 morning as brokerages remain upbeat on the robust figures posted by the country's leading automobile company f… [+3156 chars]

articles.title: NTPC may open higher on strong Q2, stock up 41% YTD; should you buy, hold or sell? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: NTPC share price has risen over 41 percent so far in 2023, outperforming benchmark Nifty.
articles.content: NTPC shares are likely to open higher on October 30, a day after the company reported a positive second quarter of FY24. The company's net profit jumped 38 percent on-year (YoY) on the back of better… [+3040 chars]

articles.title: Where to invest Rs 10 lakh today? Umeshkumar Mehta of Samco Mutual Fund suggests large-cap MFs and these 5... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: One of India’s youngest mutual fund houses, Samco believes in active fund management. Its strategy is to embrace risk. But Mehta, the firm’s chief investment officer, says the fund house has enough built-in mechanisms to predict — and avoid — volatility.

articles.author: Abhishek Kothari
articles.title: AU Small Finance Bank shares fall over 7% post Fincare merger announcement, quarterly results - CNBCTV18
articles.description: As per the deal, AU Small Finance Bank will issue 579 shares of the bank for every 2,000 shares held by shareholders of Fincare, or one share of the bank for every 3.45 shares of Fincare.

articles.title: SBI ropes in Dhoni as brand ambassador - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Business News: MUMBAI: The SBI has taken on board cricketing legend Mahendra Singh Dhoni as the bank's official brand ambassador.
